name: Coconut Bread I
author: Susan Vinson
summary: I own a small coffee shop/deli and my customers really enjoy this delicious breakfast bread! To Make Vanilla Flavored Sugar: To a 1 gallon jar of sugar, add one vanilla bean. Let sit at least one week before using.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease one 8x4 inch loaf pan
Cream the butter or margarine, vanilla flavored sugar and eggs together
Add the coconut flavoring and mix well
Mix in the self-rising flour alternately with the sour cream to the creamed mixture
Pour the batter into the prepared pan
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 50 minutes
Pour glaze over hot loaf and serve
To Make  Glaze: Mix the confectioner's sugar and milk together until smooth
